responses: Hello, thanks for visiting. How may I help you?
I'm good, all's good, thanks. How about you?
Great to hear that you are doing good. How may I help you?
See you later, thanks for visiting. Hope I was able to help!
Happy to help!

patterns: What kinds of items are there?
responses: Search your preference in our website's search bar to see all available products and offers that are going on or you can visit this link to get all the products https://terraclenz.com/products
We accept all types of payment including cash-on-delivery, UPI payment, all types of cards and netbanking

patterns: How can I track my order
I want to track my order
I need to check my order status
What is the status of my order?
responses: Visit the order page, click on the specific order, select 'track my order', and check the status. Once your order is shipped, we will provide you with a tracking ID via email or SMS, along with instructions to track your shipment.

patterns: Please Tell me about my delivery
When do I get my delivery?
responses: Intra-state delivery usually takes within 7 business days.
Yes, we ship internationally for select products. Shipping charges depend on your location. Contact us for details.

patterns: What are the locations that you deliver your products?
Places that you deliver your products?
Where can you deliver your products?
responses: We deliver our products within India and also Internationally. But delivery charges may differ. If your location is not serviceable, we will notify you during the checkout process.

patterns: How much do you charge for shipping?
responses: We offer free shipping on orders worth ₹2000 and above. International Shipping calculated based on the destination, weight, and size of the package. Applicable customs duties and taxes are the customer’s responsibility. Shipping charges (if any) will be displayed at checkout before you place your order.

patterns: My payment was processed successfully but I didn't get any order confirmation. What should I do?
Payment was completed but no confirmation
Money deducted but order is not confirmed
responses: You will receive an Email & SMS upon confirmation of your order. If it requires manual confirmation, our team will contact you within 24 hours after order placement. Delay in confirmation SMS may occur due to network error, you may receive it with a delay.

patterns: Why is my order not delivered yet?
When do I get my delivery?
responses: We are really sorry if there has been a delay in your order. It may be because of some logistic issue. If your order is within delivery period, We recommend you to please wait during this period since our Delivery Heroes making continous attempts to deliver your order!. If your order is delayed, please contact us at support@terrainternational.in, and we will assist you.
Reasons include Seller Sourcing Issues, Courier Issues, Cross Border shipment delay, Wrong Address or Phone Number, and Unavailability of Customer.

patterns: How long an order takes to be processed?
How long does an order takes to be delivered?
What is the approximation time range for an order to be delivered ?
responses: Orders are typically processed within 1-2 business days after payment confirmation. Estimated Delivery Time for Metro Cities takes around 1-2 days, for Non-Metro Cities takes around 2-4 days, for International takes around 7-10 days. Note: Delivery timelines are approximate and may vary due to unforeseen circumstances like natural disasters, strikes, or logistical delays.

patterns: can I talk to an agent
Need to speak with the customer care
responses: Contact us for further information here: Phone: +91-7022447236.

patterns: How do I can cancel my order
I want to cancel my order
responses: You can cancel your order within 24 hours of placing it, provided the order has not been shipped. For more information, please find our cancellation policy on our webite {Find it in the footer of the website}

patterns: I want to return an item
Is return of an item available?
How do I return an item?
How long do return items take
When can I return my items
responses: If you are not satisfied with your purchase, you may return the product within 3 days of delivery. For more information, please refer our return policy on oue website {Find it in the footer of the website}

patterns: How to apply for refund of an item?
What is the procedure for getting a refund?
I want refund for an item
responses: Refunds will be processed based on the condition of the order and the reason for cancellation or return {Find it in the footer of the website}

patterns: I want to know my return status
responses: Please visit the My Orders page for a list of your confirmed orders.

patterns: How can I change my profile information
I want to change my password
I want to change my phone number
I want to change my address
I want to Reset my password
I want to delete my account
responses: You can change anything to your profile information in the 'profile' section
